description:
misc/chrome/gophertool: fix manifest
according to http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/browserAction.html,
it should use "default_popup" instead of "popup".

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=100ddb84c85d ***

misc/chrome/gophertool: fix manifest
according to http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/browserAction.html,
it should use "default_popup" instead of "popup".

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 6349077: misc/chrome/gophertool: fix manifest
